text: Kyle Busch is an American racing driver. Over the course of his racing career, Busch has won a combined 212 NASCAR races across NASCAR's top 3 Series, 56 of which have been in NASCAR Cup Series, 97 in Xfinity Series, and 59 in Gander RV & Outdoors Truck Series. ==NASCAR== ===Cup Series=== In the NASCAR Cup Series, Kyle Busch, earned 2005 Rookie of the Year honors and has won the 2015 and 2019 series championships. Busch has won at the 23 different tracks he has competed in. Busch holding the checkered flag at the 2013 NRA 500 burnout at the 2013 AdvoCare 500 Busch drinking from a wine bottle in victory lane at the 2015 Toyota/Save Mart 350 Cup Series title by winning the 2015 Ford EcoBoost 400 Busch holding the checkered flag at the 2016 STP 500 Busch kissing the bricks at the 2016 Brickyard 400 Busch performing a burnout at the 2018 Toyota Owners 400 Busch performing a burnout at the 2018 Federated Auto Parts 400 Busch saluting the crowd at the 2019 Pocono 400 Busch holding the championship flag while performing a burnout after clinching his second Cup Series Series=== In the Xfinity Series, Busch, the 2004 Rookie of the Year and 2009 series champion has won 97 races, which ranks him first on the all-time wins.
